titles.title: Come Ye Sinners (hymn of the Church)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come ye sinners poor and needy Weak and wounded sick and sore Jesus ready waits to save you Full of pity love and pow'r He is able He is able He is willing doubt no more He is able He is able He is willing doubt no more{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now ye needy come and welcome God's free bounty glorify True belief and true repentance Every grace that brings us nigh Without money without money Come to Jesus Christ and buy Without money without money Come to Jesus Christ and buy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let not conscience make you linger Nor of fitness fondly dream All the fitness He requireth Is to feel your need of Him This He gives you this He gives you 'Tis the Spirit's rising beam This He gives you this He gives you 'Tis the Spirit's rising beam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come ye weary heavy laden Bruised and ruined by the Fall If you tarry till you're better You will never come at all Not the righteous not the righteous Sinners Jesus came to call Not the righteous not the righteous Sinners Jesus came to call{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}View Him prostrate in the garden On the ground your Maker lies On the bloody tree behold Him Hear Him cry before He dies "It is finished!" "It is finished!" Sinner will not this suffice "It is finished!" "It is finished!" Sinner will not this suffice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lo th'incarnate God ascended Pleads the merit of His blood Venture on Him venture wholly Let no other trust intrude None but Jesus none but Jesus Can do helpless sinners good None but Jesus none but Jesus Can do helpless sinners good{/lang-eng}
